oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Risk-Sensitive Portfolio Optimization Problems with Fixed Income Securities
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: GOEL, M
KUMAR, KS
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: optimal investment model
management
risk-sensitive control
fixed income securities
nonstationary optimal strategies
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We discuss a class of risk-sensitive portfolio optimization problems. We consider the portfolio optimization model investigated by Nagai (SIAM J. Control Optim. 41:1779-1800, 2003). The model by its nature can include fixed income securities as well in the portfolio. Under fairly general conditions, we prove the existence of an optimal portfolio in both finite-horizon and infinite-horizon problems.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: JOURNAL OF OPTIMIZATION THEORY AND APPLICATIONS, 142(1), 67-84
